description:
Designed in partnership with adventure photographer Jimmy Chin. These midweight hiking socks use performance fabrics of synthetic and natural fibres to keep your feet comfy during long days on the trail.

  • FreshTek™ moisture and odour control uses performance mesh to keep you cool, maximizing airflow and breathability
  • Infiknit™ construction add durability to high-friction areas
  • Nylon, merino blend merges the quick-drying durability of a synthetic with merino’s natural warmth and odour control
  • Anatomical medium cushioning adds protection where you need it most
  • Mechanical arch support is woven into each sock
  • Left/right engineered arch support delivers a precise fit
  • Mesh venting panels regulate heat
  • Seamless toe closure and engineered ankle protection for hotspot- and chafe-free wear
name: Stance Everest Hike Crew Socks - Unisex
